name: DON'T FALL (itch) (lougp)
description:
Don't fall is an adictive arcady game where you have got to, as the title suggests, not fall off of the blue platforms, that turn red when they are about to fall.

I am quite young and new to game developing  and this is one of the first games i made and my first upload so if you have any recomendations or suggestions feel free to share them with me.
